SELECT ua.id,url,ua.description,ua.gmt_create AS gmtCreate,ua.enable ,ua.request_type AS requestType,application,ua.class_name AS className, ua.method_name AS methodName,ua.parent_id AS parentId FROM user_info ui LEFT JOIN user_role_relation urr ON urr.`user_id`=ui.`id` LEFT JOIN role_authority_relation rar ON rar.`role_id`=urr.`role_id` LEFT JOIN user_authority ua ON ua.`id`=rar.`authority_id` WHERE ui.`username`=#{username} and ua.enable=1;
